ActCanadian Human Rights Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of JENNIFER KHURANA, former Vice-chairperson of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal, for the period she was acting as Chairperson of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal, commencing on September 2, 2021 and ending on March 24, 2022.
